image_requirements.description: Front facing, straight on, lay down all pieces in set.
Individual shots of each outfit in pack.
Front facing, straight on, lay down all pieces in set.
Individual shots of each outfit in pack.
Style tops over pants. Pant should not be covering any part of the shirts.

summary: The page outlines photo direction for children's apparel, detailing requirements for both 12-piece and 14-piece sets, including hero images and alternate shots for each outfit. Additionally, it provides a styling note regarding the arrangement of tops and pants.
